qas.question: What's the oldest rugby team in Southampton?
What division was Trojans RFC promoted to in 2008-9?
What famous player from Trojans RFC also played for the Leicester Tigers?
What position did Allen play for the Leicester Tigers?
What division do the Tottonians belong to?

context: The city is also well provided for in amateur men's and women's rugby with a number of teams in and around the city, the oldest of which is <a0_0>Trojans RFC<a0_0/> who were promoted to <a1_0>London South West 2<a1_0/> division in 2008/9. A notable former player is <a2_0>Anthony Allen<a2_0/>, who played with Leicester Tigers as a <a3_0>centre<a3_0/>. Tottonians are also in <a4_0>London South West division 2<a4_0/> and Southampton RFC are in Hampshire division 1 in 2009/10, alongside Millbrook RFC and Eastleigh RFC. Many of the sides run mini and midi teams from under sevens up to under sixteens for both boys and girls.
